mapper.insert: insert into manager_user (managerUserCode, managerUserAccount, `password`, `name`, phone, addTime, updateTime, `enable`, activity, createrCode) values (#{managerUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerUserAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), null, true, true, #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into manager_login_log (managerUserCode, loginTime, loginType, token, endTime, addTime, updateTime, enable, activity, createrCode) values (#{managerUserCode}, now(), 1, #{token}, null, now(), null, true, true, #{createrCode})
mapper.update: update manager_login_log set endTime = now(), updateTime = now() where managerUserCode = #{code} and token = #{token} and activity = true and enable = true
mapper.select: select a.*,b.permissionCode,b.permissionName,b.permissionLevel,b.parentCode from manager_user a left join un_manager_permission b on a.managerUserCode = b.managerUserCode where a.managerUserAccount = #{managerUserAccount} and a.activity = true and a.enable = true
select managerUserCode, managerUserAccount, name, phone from manager_user where managerUserCode = #{managerUserCode} and activity = true and enable = true
